article_title: Johnson & Johnson Prescribes Healthy Returns Without M&A or Breakup
article_text: You need to LOG IN to edit your watchlist.

article_metadata.description: 'Bigger' only for the sake of getting bigger makes no sense. Not trusting management of the company to execute the business is the worst blunder of them all.
article_metadata.author: Richard Saintvilus
